Posts.Content: Apr 25, 2012 09:21AM mstrouble16 wrote: I was 80% ER and PR postive with a trace in 1 node Onco score of 18.  Tumor when originally found by ultrasound was .5mm went to 1.7cm with the MRI and PETScan, and then to 2.1 cm after bilateral mastecomy.  My BS wanted to remove more nodes and put a port in but my oncologist (that she loved and said I should go to) said no to removing more nodes and port but yes to 4 rounds of Taxotere and Cytoxin. Now I'm on Tamoxifen, with so far the following side effects, blurred vision and joint pain in hips, legs and arms.
Posts.Title: Another Oncotype question mary71 Scarlet2
